name: EPIC SYSTEMS CORP., petitioner, v. Jacob LEWIS.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
EPIC SYSTEMS CORP., petitioner,
v.
Jacob LEWIS.
attorneys: The motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument is granted. The motion of the National Labor Relations Board for divided argument is granted.
casebody.head_matter:
EPIC SYSTEMS CORP., petitioner,
v.
Jacob LEWIS.
No. 16-285.
Supreme Court of the United States
Sept. 25, 2017.
The motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument is granted. The motion of the National Labor Relations Board for divided argument is granted.
